Install and load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


Load data set
```{r}
library(readr)
seagrass<-read.csv("../data/SeagrassPubs.csv")
View(seagrass)
```

Look at data
```{r}
head(seagrass)
summary(seagrass)
glimpse(seagrass)
```
